description: Episode number 4 of Series "Confusion in the elderly". One of a series about the techniques for management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This demonstrates a variety of treatments of admission to hospital. Shows actual patients with different presentations of confusion, and outlines basic principles of management designed to allow the patients to get the most out of life.
